title: stats
txt_content: stats到计分版的分数可不可以更改?

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
可以...https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/记分板
只有少数几个非stat不可改

用scoreboard players set/add/remove/reset...

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content: 不过一般还是建议用scoreboard players operation赋值到别的地方才继续处理 不然不小心处理到一半执行了别的命令修改了就麻烦了
